h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master
content: Once the fight settles down to a 1v1, you'll get a better idea of his many attacks and how best to avoid them. He has a number of different sword sweep attacks he can do when you try a frontal assault, slicing downwards with a forward and backward slash, then spinning around quickly to perform a third hit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Hundred-Eyed Daoist Master'.
The content is as follows:
Once the fight settles down to a 1v1, you'll get a better idea of his many attacks and how best to avoid them. He has a number of different sword sweep attacks he can do when you try a frontal assault, slicing downwards with a forward and backward slash, then spinning around quickly to perform a third hit.
